Articles.Content:
Hi,

How do I rename and change the icon of a craft or debris in orbit, or landed in version 0.21.1?

Thanks!
You right-click on the command pod, and click "Rename Vessel."
Yeah, that's how I used to do it, but for some reason I don't have the "rename vessel" option anymore... At least not on Probes, I have to check with capsules.
